text:
Burglars have stolen Rs. 3.30 lakh-worth silver and gold ornaments from the house of a teacher. Police said unidentified burglars entered the house of teacher N. Maria Antony Selvaraj (45) of Mariathaaipuram after breaking the rear door when the inmate had gone to church for New Year special prayers. On returning home, the family members found that the burglars had stolen 132 grams of gold and 50 grams of silver articles.

Based on the complaint from Mr. Selvaraj, the Surandai police have registered a case.
title: House burgled
